DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect single oral dos MOA-728 compare positive control subject methadone therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Oral MOA-728 Subjects Methadone Therapy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Healthy men woman , age 18 65 year . 2 . History methadone treatment least 1 month , dose > =30 < =140 mg/day . Exclusion : 1 . History active presence clinically important medical disease . 2 . Allergy opioids .
